name: contensis-core-api
description: A dependency library used by contensis-delivery-api and contensis-management-api

scripts.build:es5: npx rimraf -g bundle-es5/* && npx tsc -p src
scripts.build:esnext: npx rimraf -g bundle-es2015/* && npx tsc -p src/tsconfig-esnext.json
scripts.build:npm: npx rimraf -g lib/* && npx tsc -p src/tsconfig-npm.json
scripts.all: npm run build:es5 && npm run build:esnext && npm run build:npm

author: Zengenti Ltd <development@zengenti.com>
